dialog.name: Dialog Shown
dialog.hint: Indicates whether the dialog has been shown for this user

conditions.name: Use Custom Conditions
conditions.hint: The Elkan 5e module automates the function of conditions. Our module is designed with the Elkan conditions in mind, but if you don't want any of the Elkan improvements to conditions, you can switch back to SRD conditions.

tools.name: Tools List
tools.hint: Add old tools removed by the Elkan ruleset (like woodcarving). May not function properly with Elkan classes.

armor.name: Armor List
armor.hint: Add deprecated armor proficiencies. May not function properly with Elkan classes.

weapons.name: Weapon List
weapons.hint: Add deprecated weapon proficiencies. May not function properly with Elkan classes.

draconic-toughness.name: Draconic Toughness Update
draconic-toughness.hint: Uncheck to revert Draconic Toughness to 13 + Dex instead of 14 + Dex.
